title: Word Machine
description: A fun factory-themed MicroSim where children load sounds into a machine and watch gears spin as the sounds blend into a word, making phonics concrete and engaging.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Reading
Phonics
Blending
Gamification
learningObjectives: Identify the three sounds in CVC words
Explain that sounds combine to make words
Load sounds in correct order to build words
Build multiple words using the machine metaphor

controls.label: Sound Hoppers
controls.description: Click to load each sound into the machine

controls.label: BUILD WORD!
controls.description: Process loaded sounds into a word

assumptions: User can click hoppers and buttons
limitations: May be overwhelming for some learners
